title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 4 Scholar Program is designed to bridge academic strength with independent thinking. It covers the complete school curriculum — from core subjects to tests, assignments, and projects — and builds deep understanding through guided learning, creativity, and real-life application.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Mathematics, Science, Social Studies, GK, Value Education, Art & Craft, and more.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Full academic support: classwork, homework, tests, projects, and presentations
- Weekly academic modules with concept boosters and applied learning
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard for tracking academic and behavioral growth
- Merit Badges for project completion, reading stamina, concept mastery, and creativity
- Blends school performance with imagination, logic, and self-expression

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
In Class 4, learners step into real-world technology concepts through guided block-based coding, design logic, and digital storytelling. CodeVoyagers nurtures early tech creators by exploring platforms like Scratch, introducing flowcharts, and applying logic to mini-projects that reflect how modern apps and games are built.

This is the beginning of understanding how the digital world actually works — through creation, not consumption.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Block-based coding (Scratch), animations, game logic, and basic data thinking
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault with structured, multi-level logic challenges
- Creative projects like animated stories, simple interactive quizzes, and app logic
- Parent+Child Dashboard showing logical growth, creativity, and coding comfort
- Builds early-stage foundation for AI, web design, and future-ready tech skills

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 4 communication program focuses on advanced speaking, correct pronunciation, structured grammar, and writing fluency. Learners engage in debates, storytelling, creative writing, comprehension passages, and stage expressions to enhance fluency, vocabulary, and confidence.

This is also the stage where multilingual flexibility can be gently introduced.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Emphasis on spoken English with role plays, voice clarity, and stage expression
- Grammar building, paragraph writing, diary entries, and reading comprehension
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! for personalized speech and accent refinement
- Optional multi-language training - may it be French, German, or any other
- Builds confident academic and social communicators with strong stage presence

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Class 4 MathMagicians apply logic to real-life scenarios — from money and measurement to patterns and multiplication. Students solve multi-step problems, explore geometry, and build numeracy skills through engaging hands-on kits and challenges that make numbers meaningful.

The focus is on mathematical fluency, reasoning, and connection to everyday life.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Focus on multiplication, division, area/perimeter, word problems, and number logic
- Brain Gym activities for mental agility and real-life math application
- Projects include time tracking, shopping budgets, shape measurement, and logic puzzles
- Merit Badges for accuracy, reasoning, and speed
- Builds confidence for Olympiads, real-world budgeting, and practical math fluency
